desc: Create a release for an event.

event_id.desc: id of event release belongs to

enable_super_combo_summary.desc: For combo releases only. Include a summary of a combo in the order summary or not. Default: true

has_success_message.desc: Display the custom success message or not. Default: false

invoice.desc: Allow customers to pay by requesting an invoice rather than using a card.

max_tickets_per_person.desc: The maximum number of tickets per registration.

min_tickets_per_person.desc: The minimum number of tickets per registration.

not_a_ticket.desc: Disable issuing of PDF/Apple Wallet tickets or not. For example if this release is for merchandise rather than an actual ticket. Default false

position.desc: The position of the release in the list of all releases for the event.

default_quantity.desc: The default number of tickets selected for this release on the event page. Default: 0

question_ids.desc: An array of the IDs of Questions attached to the release. The order of the IDs represents the order in which the questions will be asked.

request_company_name.desc: Do registrations which include this release requrie a company name.

request_vat_number.desc: Do registrations which include this release require a VAT number.

require_billing_address.desc: Do registrations which include this release require a billing address.

require_email.desc: Do tickets for this release require an email. Default: true

require_name.desc: Do tickets for this release require a name. Default: false

secret.desc: Is it only accessible via a secret link or is it visible to everyone on the event page. Default: false

slug.desc: A unique identifier for release to be used as URI

start_at.desc: The time when the release will go on sale.

end_at.desc: The time when the release will go off sale.

success_message_text.desc: A custom message to be displayed to customers after a successful order of this release.

waiting_list_enabled_during_sold_out.desc: Enable waiting list when this release sells out or not. Default: false

archived.desc: Is the release archived or not. Default: false
